default.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: What is Banana Generator?
items.answer: A free AI photo editor and image generator powered by the Nano Banana model.

items.question: Do I need to sign up or pay?
items.answer: No. Itâ€™s fast, free, and unlimited to get started.

items.question: What formats are supported?
items.answer: Upload common formats like PNG and JPG; high-res export is supported.

items.question: Is my data private and secure?
items.answer: We follow a privacy-first policy. You keep ownership of your images.

default.supportingCopy: Need more details? <contactLink>Talk with our AI support team</contactLink> or learn about our mission on the <aboutLink>Banana Generator about page</aboutLink>.
